## BatchOperationsService.batchFinishActivity() method

Finishes a batch of activities. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static batchFinishActivity({ requestModel, }: {
        requestModel: BatchFinishActivityRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
